original_text: Now, look at Zion, the city where we have our festivals. Yes, you will see Jerusalem. It will be a place that is quiet and safe. It will be like a tent that people will never move. They will never pull up its pegs. They will never break its ropes. Now, look at Zion, the city where we have our festivals. Yes, you will see Jerusalem. It will be a place that is quiet and safe. It will be like a tent that people will never move. They will never pull up its pegs. They will never break its ropes. Now, look at Zion, the city where we have our festivals. Yes, you will see Jerusalem. It will be a place that is quiet and safe. It will be like a tent that people will never move. They will never pull up its pegs. They will never break its ropes. Now, look at Zion, the city where we have our festivals.
korean_text: 우리 절기의 시온 성을 보라 네 눈이 안정된 처소인 예루살렘을 보리니 그것은 옮겨지지 아니할 장막이라 그 말뚝이 영영히 뽑히지 아니할 것이요 그 줄이 하나도 끊어지지 아니할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Now, look at Zion
sentences.korean_translation: 이제, 시온을 보라

sentences.original_text: the city where we have our festivals
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 절기를 지키는 도시

sentences.original_text: Yes, you will see Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 너는 예루살렘을 보게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: It will be a place that is quiet and safe
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳은 조용하고 안전한 곳이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: It will be like a tent that people will never move
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 사람들이 결코 옮기지 않을 천막 같을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will never pull up its pegs
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 말뚝을 결코 뽑지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will never break its ropes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 줄을 결코 끊지 않을 것이다

sentences.korean_translation: 이제, 시온을 보라
